Title: Get the location of the ISS using DNS
Description: I love DNS esoterica. Weird little things that you can shove in the global directory to be distributed around the world instantly(ish).  Domain names, like www.example.com usually resolve to servers. As much as we think of "the cloud" as being some intangible morass of ethereal Turing-machines floating in probability space, the more prosaic reality is that they're just boxen in data centres.
